SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.server.rmi

Class RMIMainServer

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.server.rmi.RMIMainServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
MainServerActions, Serializable, Runnable, Remote
public class RMIMainServer extends UnicastRemoteObject implements MainServerActions, Runnable
This class represents the RMI Main server to connect to. The main server is used in client communications that are not in-game. The class implements runnable so it can be delegated to a dedicated thread.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      This method sets up the RMI server registry.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • connectToMain

      public void connectToMain(String username, MainViewActions clientMainView, GameViewActions gameViewActions) throws RemoteException
      This method must be called when connecting to the server for the first time. This method is used from the client (via RMI) to connect to the main server. The addConnectedClient method will verify the username and reply to the client with a UserInfoEvent giving him an adequate id.
      Specified by:
      connectToMain in interface MainServerActions
      Parameters:
      username - the client's username
      clientMainView - the client's main view
      gameViewActions - the client's game view
      Throws:
      RemoteException - thrown when a communication error occurs

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect(UserInfo userInfo, MainViewActions clientMainView, GameViewActions gameViewActions) throws RemoteException
      This method is used when connecting to the server with an already existing account. The client can retrieve the UserInfo, for example, from a config file he created after connecting for the first time. This method is used from the client when it wants to reconnect to the server. The addReconnectedClient will verify the username and reply to the client with a UserInfoEvent giving him an adequate id.
      Specified by:
      reconnect in interface MainServerActions
      Parameters:
      userInfo - the user information
      clientMainView - the client's main view
      gameViewActions - the client's game view
      Throws:
      RemoteException - thrown when a communication error occurs

    • transmitCommand

      public void transmitCommand(MainCommand command) throws RemoteException
      This method is used to transmit a main command to the server. This method is used from the client to send a command to the server. Commands received are executed calling the execute method.
      Specified by:
      transmitCommand in interface MainServerActions
      Parameters:
      command - the command to be sent
      Throws:
      RemoteException - thrown when a communication error occurs
